articles.title: National Meeting Marks 3rd Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Posts of WPK, State
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 3rd Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Posts of WPK, State
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Saturday to celebrate the 3rd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the state.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central guidance bodies in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and officials of organs and industrial establishments, labor innovators and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK in reflection of the unanimous will and desire of the entire party and army and all the people was the greatest honor and fortune for the party and the revolution, the state and the nation. 
					
					 He is the most distinguished statesman as he is leading the party and the state to one victory after another with rare qualifications and political caliber.
					
					 He has performed immortal exploits to go down in the history of the country during the days of making an outstanding political history.
					
					 He has conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities, clearly indicating the orientation and ways of bringing about new turns in all fields of building the party and armed forces and carrying out economic and cultural construction.
					
					 He has consolidated the revolutionary ranks as a harmonious whole which forms a unit of comrades centered on the C.C., the WPK and shares the same breath, providing a political and ideological guarantee for the final victory.
					
					 He has developed the revolutionary armed forces into a matchless army replete with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and equipped with diverse means of powerful strike of Korean style.
					
					 He regarded science and technology as one of the three mainstays for building a thriving socialist nation and has put the nation's overall science and technology on a new high level. 
					
					 The work for placing national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern, scientific and IT basis made dynamic progress thanks to a high-pitched drive for breaking through the cutting edge and hosts of factories and modern production bases were built to be models and icons of industrial establishments in the new century.
					
					 Latest scientific and technological successes have been made one after another to further consolidate the position of the satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state thanks to the party's policy of attaching importance to science and technology and talents.
					
					 The whole country is very pleased with the creation of famous songs worth national treasures and spectacular successes in sports matches.
					
					 It is the immutable truth which all of us learned while following Kim Jong Un that the DPRK is sure to win every battle it fights and the final victory is certain as it is led by him.
					
					 The reporter called on all officials, party members and other people to protect Kim Jong Un politically, ideologically and with their lives and remain loyal to his idea and leadership.
					
					 The WPK and the DPRK government will open up a broad avenue to independent reunification at any cost, meeting the blatant challenges of the separatist forces at home and abroad with the might of Songun, true to the noble intention of the great leaders, the reporter noted, adding that they would make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with all countries that respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly toward it, and achieve peace and security of the world and prosperity common to humankind.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Leaves for India
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Leaves for India
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and his party left here on Saturday to pay an official visit to the Republic of India.

articles.title: Educational Aid Fund and Stipends Sent for Korean Children in Japan
articles.content:
Educational Aid Fund and Stipends Sent for Korean Children in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un saw to it that educational aid fund and stipends were sent to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the 103rd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The fund and stipends sent for the democratic national education of children of Korean residents in Japan this time amounts to 238.04 million yen.
					
					 The educational aid fund and stipends so far sent by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in 161 installments total 47,569,190,390 yen.

articles.title: 4th April Spring People's Art Festival Opens
articles.content:
4th April Spring People's Art Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The 4th April Spring People's Art Festival was opened with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Leader Kim Jong Il who was possessed of high sense of moral obligation as a revolutionary and unparalleled artistic talent as his inborn disposition fathomed the Korean people's minds missing for the President very much with the lapse of time and made sure that the people's art festival was organized.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un paid deep attention to the successful opening of the festival this significant year. 
					
					 The art festival brought together more than 1,500 artistes and working people of 50 organizations selected in the capital and local areas. The festival is divided into categories of art troupes, art squads, itinerant art squads and art groups.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam who is chairman of the organizing committee of the art festival, officials concerned, participants in the art festival and working people in the city.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam said in his inaugural speech that the art festival was a great meaningful political art festival where the participants would represent through dances and songs people's intense loyalty to the great leaders, their unshakable faith in Kim Jong Un and their conviction and optimism about the final victory.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the art festival would rev up the atmosphere celebrating the Day of the Sun and help mark the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea as great revolutionary auspicious events.
					
					 Then followed an inaugural performance.

articles.title: National Calligraphy Festival Opens
articles.content:
National Calligraphy Festival Opens 
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A national calligraphy festival was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Seen at the venue of the festival is acryl painting "Wishes of All People" depicting tender-hearted Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Displayed at the festival are at least 250 pieces of calligraphic work dealing with their aphorisms, contemporary words, famous compositions and lyric passages written with diverse strokes created by calligraphers and calligraphic enthusiasts in work sites for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The Songhwa fine art exhibition was opened that day on the same occasion.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Fourth April Spring People's Art Festival Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. 
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Young People's Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Young People's Dancing Parties Held 
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in Pyongyang had dancing parties on Saturday on the 3rd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					 Dancing parties began at the plazas of the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places amid the playing of songs "Our Leader Loved by People" and "Glory to Our Great Party". 
					
					 The participants danced, extending highest glory to Kim Jong Un who has exalted the dignity and national power of the great Paektusan power all over the world.
					
					 They also presented dances to the tune of "Our Country Is Witnessing Changes", "People's Country" and other songs, expressing boundless respect and reverence for Kim Jong Un who ushered in a new era of prosperity and is realizing all dreams and desires of the people.

articles.title: Kazakh FM Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kazakh FM Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Kazakhstan led by Roving Ambassador Barlybay Sadykov Saturday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. 
					 The guests paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in profound reverence.
					
					 In the halls of immortality where they lie in state, the guests paid homage to them. 
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Kazak Foreign Ministry Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
Kazak Foreign Ministry Delegation Flies Back
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Kazakhstan led by Roving Ambassador Barlybay Sadykov flew back on Saturday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A Japanese delegation for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism led by Yachiyo Hayashi, vice-chairman of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket before the statues in humble reverence before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: More Thrice-cursed Atrocities Committed by Japan in Past Revealed
articles.content:
More Thrice-cursed Atrocities Committed by Japan in Past Revealed
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Another crime was revealed indicting Japan for its thrice-cursed atrocities against humankind.
					 The Kyodo News of Japan said on April 4 that the medicine faculty of Kyushu University displayed an exhibit which detailed the circumstances of the case of dissecting living bodies of U.S. army prisoners by Japan during World War II.
					
					 The crime was committed just before the Japanese defeat.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists made no scruple of perpetrating such crimes as dissecting the living bodies in order to examine the effectiveness of biochemical weapons made by them.
					
					 No matter how desperately Japan may try to escape from the responsibility for its shameless past crimes, the crimes against humanity that would make even brutes blush will be surely liquidated.

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea under Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea under Leadership of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Papers today dedicate editorials to the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state. He is the outstanding leader who is steering Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea to victories, say the editorials.
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have firmly grasped in their practical struggle the greatness of the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un and are confident of the hopeful future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea which will prosper forever, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's leadership is a powerful engine for accomplishing the cause of modeling the whole party and society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, a militant banner which makes the revolutionary feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their revolutionary legacies shed their rays as the eternal treasures and a pabulum which helps translate their ideals and desires into a brilliant reality.
					
					 In the past three years he has energetically led the struggle to uphold and glorify the gains of revolution associated with their whole lives.
					
					 It is his firm determination and leadership principle to carry out unconditionally and under any circumstances what was planned and desired by them.
					
					 A new history of epochal changes is unfolding in the great era of Kim Jong Un in one year, not in ten years. 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that thanks to his leadership, their desire will certainly come true and the people's paradise to be envied by the world people will be built on this land.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for more dynamically advancing toward the bright future of the DPRK for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche with high national pride and self-esteem of holding Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Act of Scattering Leaflets Is Deliberate Provocation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Act of Scattering Leaflets Is Deliberate Provocation
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The ambassador on human rights of the puppet Foreign Ministry of south Korea in an article dedicated to a magazine issued by the "Institute for Unification Studies" cried out for "putting to practical use such means as leaflets against the north" while blustering "psychological warfare against the north by the use of leaflets, loudspeakers and radios" has "massive impact" on the north.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this is an unpardonable invective to escalate confrontation of social systems between the north and the south and realize at any cost the ambition for the invasion of the north as it revealed the south Korean puppet authorities' intention.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have misled the public opinion while giving impression that the scattering of leaflets has nothing to do with them but the ambassador's remarks proved that it was not "self-guided acts" of human scum but a deliberate provocation racket with the involvement and at the instigation of the puppet authorities, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The mask of hypocrisy and deception has been taken off. The south Korean puppet forces are left with no excuses whatsoever.
					
					 As the puppet forces openly disclosed their intention to stage psychological warfare against the DPRK in disregard of the north-south agreement, it is quite natural for the DPRK to resolutely counter it.
					
					 There is no need to sit at negotiating table with despicable confrontational maniacs who are hell bent on destroying the north-south relations while pursuing the traitorous plan of "unification of social systems" awake or asleep.
					
					 Whether the anti-DPRK propaganda means are leaflets, loudspeakers and radios or they are used anywhere, they can never escape the merciless retaliatory blows by the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces will be made to hold full responsibility for the ensuing catastrophic consequences.

articles.title: KCTU Declares General Strike
articles.content:
KCTU Declares General Strike
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting in Seoul on April 8 and declared a general strike demanding wage hike and stable employment of cleaning and guard workers. 
					 Speakers at the meeting said the political circle including the "Saenuri Party" passively approached the issue of increasing the lowest wage of workers and that Park Geun Hye should be paid the lowest wage, to begin with.
					
					 They called on all workers and those involved in cleaning and guard to get united in one mind and overthrow the Park Geun Hye regime through the general strike.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Strongly Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Strongly Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the Consultative Council of Families of Victims for Probing Truth about April 16 Ferry Sewol Disaster and Building Safe Society, the All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster, the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society, the Bar Association for Democratic Society and other south Korean organizations held a press conference in Seoul on April 7 to demand the retraction of the hypocritical "enforcement ordinance" on ferry Sewol disaster. 
					 The special law on Sewol disaster was adopted for probing the truth about the disaster through actions of millions of people, but the present regime is blocking its enforcement by use of power, they noted. 
					
					 They declared they would stage strong protests such as hunger strike, publication of appeal, candle-light rally and all-people memorial service to seek probe into the truth about the disaster.
					
					 Bereaved families and citizens held a meeting in Seoul on April 5 in demand of probe into the truth about the disaster.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Protest Japanese Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Protest Japanese Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Chongryon
 Tokyo, April 9 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan staged a protest in front of the building of the Japanese Police Agency in Tokyo on Thursday to denounce the police authorities' unprecedented fascist suppression of Chongryon.
					 Present there were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The vice-chairman read out a letter of protest.
					
					 It is an unpardonable fascist violence that the police authorities raided the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon with the mobilization of huge police after creating a terror-ridden atmosphere on March. 26, the letter of protest noted.
					
					 It demanded an immediate apology and stop to the vicious politically-motivated suppression, adding that this politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon would hurt the DPRK-Japan relations. 
					
					 The protesters chanted slogans protesting the police suppression and urging the Japanese authorities to apologize at once, holding placards denouncing the brigandish raid.

articles.title: Japan's Fascist Action against Chongryon Condemned by United Confederation of Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Japan's Fascist Action against Chongryon Condemned by United Confederation of Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of the Koreans in Russia issued statements denouncing the Japanese authorities for their unheard-of fascist action against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Kim Chil Song, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, in the statement on March 31 said that the Japanese authorities searched the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee for the first time in the history of Chongryon.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities' illegal search was an intolerable provocation and grave infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Chae Son, vice-chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, in a statement on March 30 said:
					
					 All Koreans in Russia are greatly angered by the action of the Japanese authorities and are strongly urging them to immediately apologize to the DPRK and Chongryon for it.
					
					 Through the recent action the Japanese authorities sought to tarnish the image of Chongryon. 
					
					 The statement urged the Japanese authorities to immediately apologize for their suppression of Chongryon and severely punish those responsible for it.

articles.title: Polish Organization Protests against Japan's Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Polish Organization Protests against Japan's Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association on April 4 sent a letter to the Japanese ambassador to Poland in protest against the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The letter said:
					
					 The Polish Branch of the KFA is deeply concerned about the Japanese authorities' ever more undisguised suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, the search operations conducted against the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, in particular.
					
					 We remind the authorities of the fact that Koreans in Japan are the victims of Japan's colonial policy towards Korea and their descendants.
					
					 Japan had illegally kept Korea under its occupation for over 40 years, killing many Koreans and inflicting indescribable mental and physical pain upon them.
					
					 However, Japan has neither apologized nor paid reparation for its crimes committed under its colonial rule and has resorted to vicious moves against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 Viewing this as an extreme national discrimination which can be enforced only by a fascist state, we strongly demand the Japanese authorities immediately stop the suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Organization Denounces Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Denounces Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public a statement on March 28 in denunciation of the police authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities conducted an unreasonable search operation against the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee on March 26.
					
					 This was politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon by the reactionary ruling quarters.
					
					 Chongryon is an overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK active for defending the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We will never pardon the Japanese government's fascist action of trampling down the sovereignty of Chongryon, and resolutely protest against it.
					
					 The government is working hard to stretch the tentacles of aggression to the DPRK and other Asian countries while zealously joining the U.S. in its strategy for dominating the world in a bid to realize its ambition for reinvasion such as the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense," far from repenting of its past aggression against Korea and other Asian countries.
					
					 The politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon was prompted by the Japanese government's hostile policy towards the DPRK, an act quite contrary to the spirit of the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					 We will support activities of Chongryon and struggle in solidarity with it for peace in Japan and Asia and the Japan-DPRK friendship.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), deals with the historical position of Kimilsungia, significance of its cultivation and tasks for bringing the flower of the sun into bloom everywhere in Korea.
					
					 Its releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 6.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting and photo and book exhibition took place in Moscow on April 8 under the sponsorship of the preparatory committee of the Russian social circles for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and photos and books introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 A reporter and speakers praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, distinguished politician and invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 Referring to the immortal contributions he made to the Korean revolution and global cause of independence, they stressed that the feats he performed for the development of friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of Russia and the DPRK will always go down in history.
					
					 They expressed confidence that the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il would be successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They sincerely wished the Korean people shining successes in building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification, united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by Koreans in China
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "We will vigorously struggle to turn the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to the conclusion of peace treaty" on March 24.
					 The statement said that the Koreans in the U.S. sent an open letter to Obama in protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, demanding the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and the improvement of the north-south relations, and also waged an active movement for bringing the national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, as early as possible. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all the Koreans in China extend full support and solidarity to the struggle of the Koreans in the U.S. and will turn out as one in the sacred struggle for the national reunification.
					
					 All the Koreans in China together with the Koreans in the U.S. and other overseas Koreans will make all efforts to turn the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to the conclusion of a peace treaty and achieve world peace and security.

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce U.S.-South Korea Military Drills
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce U.S.-South Korea Military Drills
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Organizations under the General Association of Koreans in China released statements in denunciation of the frantic U.S.-south Korea war drills.
					 Its Jiamusi branch association said in a statement on Mar. 15 madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills are under way to rapidly hurl and forward-deploy U.S. imperialist aggression forces in contingency on the Korean peninsula, make surprise preemptive strike by "combined forces" and "liquidate" the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "occupy Pyongyang".
					
					 The joint military drills are cursed and denounced by all Koreans as they brought to light the true colors of the south Korean puppet group as confrontation maniacs keen to chill the unanimous desire for national reunification and realize its wild ambition for "unification of social systems," it noted.
					
					 The Shenyang City branch in a statement on March 10 denounced the military drills as a blatant challenge to the DPRK's proposal for national reconciliation, unity and reunification and unpardonable saber-rattling. 
					
					 As proven by reality, the above-said war rehearsals patently prove that "dialogue", "improvement of  relations" and the like about which the south Korean puppet group talks volumes whenever an opportunity presents itself are sheer lies to deceive the public at home and abroad, the statement noted.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese paper Arpan dedicated one whole page to the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Answers to Questions Raised by the Chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association" on April 3.
					 The work, published on November 29, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the essence of the Juche idea, invincibility of socialism in the DPRK, ways of achieving Korea's reunification and the DPRK government's stand on boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Nepal.
					
					 The paper also carried a photo of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Romanian Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Romanian Party
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, the great sun" on its website The Juche Idea on April 6 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The President was the most distinguished leader and peerless patriot representing the 20th century, the article said, and went on:
					
					 He founded the Juche idea clarifying the philosophical principle centered on man that man is the master of everything and decides everything and advanced the idea of building Juche-oriented socialist construction centered on the popular masses.
					
					 He always solved all problems by dint of inexhaustible might and creative wisdom of the people as required by their wishes and interests.
					
					 He put forward the unique military idea and theory in his early years and directed big efforts to strengthening the revolutionary armed forces to win only victories in decisive battles and fierce confrontation with the imperialists.
					
					 He was the great sage possessed of broad magnanimity and generosity.
					
					 He was, indeed, the greatest leader of the revolution in history, tender-hearted father of the people and peerlessly great man revered by all people.
					
					 He is the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and the sun of Juche as he laid a solid foundation for the triumphant advance and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche in Korea.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Seminars on President Kim Il Sung's exploits took place in foreign countries on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 They were held in Bucharest, Romania and by the branches of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Indonesian companies and a Malaysian company between March 27 and April 5.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said:
					
					 The President, born into the most patriotic and revolutionary family, was not only the great leader of the Korean people who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people but the most prominent elder statesman in the 20th century who made great contributions to the global cause of independence. 
					
					 The world knows no such a prominent leader as the President who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, founded the immortal Juche idea, liberated the country and led the socialist construction to victory despite the imperialists' moves for aggression.
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 We will intensify information service on his greatness among the Romanian people.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the President for founding the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, 1932 and defeating the two imperialist powers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 5 to mark the 3rd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Un identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, is successfully carrying forward their idea and cause.
					
					 The Korean people have worked world-startling miracles and innovations in a brief span of time under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, it noted, went on:
					
					 Monumental structures have been rapidly built or remodeled to promote the people's wellbeing in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the great leader who created the Korean speed.
					
					 He inspected many units of the People's Army, even the forefront posts near from enemy posts, to bolster up the combat capabilities of the army.
					
					 He has energetically led the struggle to reunify the country under the banner of the three charters for national reunification, advanced by Kim Il Sung and formulated by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people are making dynamic progress for the rosy future, united close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Posted by Romanian Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Posted by Romanian Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website The Juche Idea on April 6.

articles.title: Acto central por 3o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un en supremo cargo de Partido y Estado
articles.content:
Acto central por 3o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un en supremo cargo de Partido y Estado
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 3o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el supremo cargo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado.
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios, innovadores laborales y trabajadores de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas de esta capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario, del CC del PTC.
					
					El informante senalo que la eleccion del Mariscal como Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea segun la unanime voluntad y deseo de todo el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo, es la gran gloria y fortuna del Partido, la revolucion y el Estado.
					
					El Mariscal es el mas destacado politico quien conduce a la victoria el Partido y el Estado con su extraordinaria cualidad y capacidad politica, elogio y prosiguio:
					
					En los dias cuando registraba la cronica de politica sobresaliente, el Mariscal acumulo las hazanas inmortales que brillaran para siempre en los anales de la patria.
					
					Al desarrollar las energicas actividades ideo-teoricas, ilumino claramente la direccion y los remedios para producir nuevo cambio en todas las ramas de la construccion del Partido, las fuerzas armadas, la economia y la cultura.
					
					Ha convertido las filas revolucionarias en las de camaradas unidas monoliticamente en torno al CC del PTC que posibilito preparar firmemente la garantia politico-ideologica para lograr la victoria final.
					
					Ha fortalecido las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias como el invencible ejercito armado con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu y dotado de los variados y poderosos medios de ataque al estilo coreano.
					
					Presento la ciencia y tecnica como uno de los tres pilares para la construccion de un Estado prospero y llevo a una nueva alta etapa la ciencia y tecnologia del pais en conjunto.
					
					En medio del esfuerzo dinamico por alcanzar niveles sofisticados, se impulsaron con energia la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion, la fundamentacion cientifica y la informatizacion de la economia nacional y se edificaron muchas fabricas y modernas bases de produccion que sirven de modelo de la instalacion de industria de nuevo siglo.
					
					Gracias a la politica del PTC de dar importancia a la ciencia y las personas talentosas, se lograron sucesivamente los exitos de la ciencia y tecnica de punta que contribuyen a consolidar mas la posicion del pais fabricador y lanzador del satelite artificial y del poseedor de las armas nucleares y todo el pais bulle con la creacion de las canciones famosas de importancia nacional y con los orgullosos exitos en la rama deportiva.
					
					Bajo la direccion del Mariscal, salimos siempre victoriosos y el triunfo final es definitivo, lo que es nuestra verdad adquirida en el camino de seguir al Mariscal.
					
					Todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y trabajadores deben defender en lo politico e ideologico y a ultranza al Mariscal y apoyar fielmente su idea y direccion.
					
					El PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC abriran a toda costa un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente frustrando el desafio atroz de las fuerzas divisionistas internas y externas del pais con el poderio del Songun en pleno acato al noble proposito de los grandes Generalisimos, ampliaran y desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises que respeten la soberania de la RPDC y la traten con amistad y se esforzaran activamente por la paz y la seguridad del mundo y la prosperidad comun de la humanidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia subsidios escolares y becas a los hijos de coreanos en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia subsidios escolares y becas a los hijos de coreanos en Japon
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 103o aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) los subsidios escolares y becas valorados en 238 millones 40 mil \ (moneda japonesa) para la educacion nacional democratica de los hijos de los coreanos radicados en Japon.
					La suma total de tales fondos enviados por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en 161 ocasiones hasta la fecha llega a 47 mil 569 millones 190 mil 390 \.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion del presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion del presidente de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 3 el presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, Thein Sein.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Con motivo jubiloso del 103o aniversario del dia de nacimiento del Presidente eterno de la RPDC Kim Il Sung, tengo el placer de extender a Su Excelencia la mas calida felicitacion y el maximo voto en nombre del pueblo de la RUM y en el mio propio.
					
					Aprovechando la oportunidad deseo que bajo su direccion, el pueblo de la RPDC siga logrando progreso y prosperidad y vuestro pais alcance mayores exitos y desarrollo.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Inaugurado IV Festival Artistico del Pueblo Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Inaugurado IV Festival Artistico del Pueblo Abril en Primavera
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung (15 de abril), quedo inaugurado el IV Festival Artistico del Pueblo Abril en Primavera.
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, con su noble obligacion moral revolucionaria y extraordinaria nobleza artistica, hizo organizar el festival artistico del pueblo al percatarse de la ferviente anoranza del pueblo coreano al Presidente.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un presto profunda atencion para que el festival del presente ano se desarrolle exitosamente.
					
					En la presente cita participaran mas de mil 500 artistas y trabajadores provenientes de 50 grupos seleccionadas en el centro y las localidades y se realizara dividido en las clases de los conjuntos artisticos, los de propaganda artistica, los de  agitacion artistica movil y los grupos artisticos.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 11 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este.
					
					A la ocasion asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin,  el ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam, presidente del Comite Organizador del Festival, funcionarios de rama interesada, los participantes en el festival y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El presidente del Comite Organizador del Festival dijo que el presente Festival es el gran certamen politico y artistico que demuestra en los bailes y canciones la noble fidelidad del pueblo coreano a los lideres coreanos, la conviccion invariable en el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y la fe y optimismo en la victoria final.
					
					Expreso su conviccion de que el festival contribuira activamente para aumentar el clima de dia del Sol y glorificar el 70o aniversario de la Liberacion de la Patria y la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como gran acontecimiento revolucionario.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo la funcion inaugural.

articles.title: Baile de jovenes y estudiantes por 11 de abril
articles.content:
Baile de jovenes y estudiantes por 11 de abril
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 11 los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos dedicados al 3o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En las explanadas frente al Arco de Triunfo, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de la capital comenzaron los bailes al compas de las canciones "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y "Gloria a nuestro gran partido".
					
					  Los bailadores expresaron maxima gloria al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien glorifica a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio nacional de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					  Ellos bailaron al compas de las canciones "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo", "Pais del pueblo", etc. con el infinito respeto y veneracion al gran hombre sin par quien abrio una nueva epoca de la prosperidad en esta tierra y materializa todo el sueno e ideal del pueblo.
